Package com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileUtils
    Utility methods for common file operations
    HashUtils
    A collection of utility methods to easily compute integers for significant fields to be used in hashCode methods based off of the guidelines listed in "Effective Java Second Edition" by Joshua Bloch
    InventoryUtils
    Utility methods for common Inventory operations
    ItemUtils
    Utility methods for common ItemStack operations
    LocationUtils
    Utility methods for common Location operations
    PlayerUtils
    Utility methods for common Player operations
    TextUtils
    Methods to manipulate strings/format other data into easily readable formats
